column1: * 1925 - The first recorded date in the writing of the Lay of Leithian
* 1974 - Mythcon 5 at wikipedia:Scripps College in wikipedia:Claremont
* 1981 - The twenty-fifth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1990 - The War of the Ring is published in the UK.
* 1992 - The second part of the Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series) of Farmer Giles of Ham is aired on BBC.

column2: a combination of Oxonmoot 1992 and Mythcon 23

column1: * 2006 - The Oxford Tolkien Conference at wikipedia:Exeter College
